What: Barbara Walters , who had her own surgery to repair a faulty heart valve last year, addresses heart disease and the fear many have of a heart operation in A Matter of Life and Death. She talks to former Bill Clinton , David Letterman , Robin Williams and Regis Philbin , celebrities who've had heart surgeries. She also talks to doctors, including her own, about prevention and the warning signs of heart trouble.

Under the leadership of Eric Schmidt , Google has branched into several new markets such as mobile devices with its Android operating system and the enterprise market with Google Apps. The company certainly hasn't been resting on its laurels, said Davis. During his time at the company, Eric Schmidt has amassed 9.2 million Google shares, worth$ 5.8 bn. 26 points 8 rebounds vs Orlando Magic Johnson 07/08 http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_Career_High_60pts_vs_the_Dwight_Howard_Orlando_Magic_04/05 Three-time scoring champ hits career high Allen Iverson gave the crowd an electrifying performance to remember. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said. "You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there."
